body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry, please forgive me. I Know this may be seem nonsense but not gonna risk *I hope the admins or mods for this site do a purge on these stupid things* I'm clear now but you, the one reading this, are not... good luck stranger.
